channel.title: The Witch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Witch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Ralph Ineson Went From a Nameless Pilot in ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ to the Almighty Galactus in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’
item.description: Working with then-unknown filmmaker Robert Eggers on ‘The Witch’ supercharged the actor’s career, eventually allowing him to play one of the biggest characters in the Marvel mythos.

item.title: How Ralph Ineson Went From a Nameless Pilot in ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ to the Almighty Galactus in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’
